messages.content: Add Perplexity Prompt from my GitHub here.

mapper.message:
Turn this research into a short, engaging, and easy to read LinkedIn post. It should encourage the audience to interact and engage with the post. Include relevant hasthags. Ensure that the message is less than 1500 characters. 

{{1.choices[].message.content}}

Turn this research into a short, engaging, and SEO based blog including professional development, education, and learnings.

{{1.choices[].message.content}}

notes.text:
Custom GPT built with Open AP API call to write a blog outline/short blog article. 

GPT Agent is trained on my brand voice, writing style, etc.
Add the output to a Google Sheet or to an AirTable database.
